channel.title: New on StrangeCharacters
channel.description: Recent content in New on StrangeCharacters

item.title: Upgrading from Congo 1.x
item.description: Although Congo 2.0 contains a large number of changes, the theme has been designed to minimise the effort required to upgrade to the latest release.

item.title: What's New in 2.0 âœ¨
item.description:
Congo 2.0 is packed with tons of new features and optimisations.

The original aim of Congo was to develop a theme that was simple and lightweight. Version 2 takes this one step further and makes the theme even more powerful while still maintaining its lightweight footprint.
